About Me

I am a computer scientist born and raised in Miami, FL. I am proficient in many programming languages. I graduated from the University of Florida with a degree in Computer Science from the College of Engineering.
  • Expert full-stack developer with experience both in enterprise and freelance work. Stays current with the latest web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, NodeJS, JQuery, AngularJS, GulpJS, Python, SQL).
  • Proficient programmer with a strong background in Object Oriented Programming. Knowledgeable about the mechanics of procedural, interpreted, and compiled programing languages.
  • Able to learn new programming languages, paradigms, and technologies quickly.
  • Well practiced in documentation tools such as JavaDoc and versioning control tools such as Git.
  • Neat, well organized, and able to prioritize to meet deadlines. Highly motivated self-starter who works well in teams.
